metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6758 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The uwsgi_expand_path function in core/utils.c in Unbit uWSGI through 2.0.15 has a stack-based buffer overflow via a large directory length. It was discovered that uWSGI mishandled certain input resulting in a stack buffer overflow. A remote attacker could use this vulnerability to cause uWSGI to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6758` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:
